title: Taken by Sea
description: Evelyn Adams has just set sail on a vacationthat she will never forget. Sunshine, relaxation,and love. It sounds simple enough....First, she meets Scott. He’s tall, dark, andhandsome. He’s sexy and alluring. And he’sinterested in her, maybe too interested....Then, she meets Austin. He’s strong and calmand nothing like the guys she’s dated back home.He’s all man and he wants her....Are either of them interested beyond this shortgetaway or are they just looking for a summer fling?...Bon Voyage!***This book should only be read by mature readers. It contains themes involving sexually explicit scenes, strong language, alcohol, and physical and sexual violence.***
author: Brooke  Nicole
